name: Mara + Anthon
description:
SpaceJumpDouble JumpShiftDashDashing Restores 1 jump

The story is that you Anthon have just recently been dumped by your girlfriend Mara. You play as your heart as you try and fill the empty void in your chest. 

You have 3 lives and after that you have to restart. 

Song Provided By http://youtube.com/danielbijan 

Produced By Daniel Bijan
